description: A delicious family pie with chicken, leek and veggies.
name: Chicken & Leek Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 can carnation condensed milk light (or normal)

recipeInstructions.text: Prep 30 mins Cook 50 mins Preheated oven 180g Spray a pie dish with cooking spray
In a saucepan, combine chicken coated with the flour, carrots, peas and celery and potato and leek and salt and pepper.
Add the chicken stock and the carnation milk put a lid on
Simmer till sauce thickens Let it cool down
Once filling is cool Prepare the frozen pastry in the sprayed pie dish.
Blind bake the short crust in the pie dish with baking paper and baking beads for 15 mins
Once out of the oven put the pie filling into the dish
Top with the puff pastry egg wash and get a fork and make some air holes.
Bake for 50 mins till nice golden brown
Let it cool down and service with a salad
